title: That Council approve the recommendation in Report CLSCLK21-030 dated December 6, 2021, of the City Clerk as follows: That By-law 05-083 respecting temporary road closures be amended in the form of amending by-law comprising Appendix A to Report CLSCLK21-030.
That the following by-laws be read a first, second and third time and finally passed: 21-108 - Being a by-law to amend By-law 05-083 being a by-law related to temporary road closures
That the following by-law be read a first, second and third time and finally passed: 21-109 - Being a by-law to confirm the proceedings of the Council at its special meeting held on December 6, 2021
That this meeting of City Council adjourn at 8:40 p.m.
